com.teama.pds
Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  com.teama.pds.Controller

public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object

Author: Jason Greaves Handles all of the history recordings, customer addings, addressbook modding, and passes information from the view to the model and vice versa.

printEventHistory

Returns a Customer object that has same phone number as input

Parameters:

Returns:
the Customer object if the customer is found, otherwise null.

customerExists

public boolean customerExists(java.lang.String phone_number)
Returns true if model already has information about this customer false otherwise.

Parameters:
phone_number - phone number of the customer to check
Returns:
true if the customer already exists, otherwise false

getSimulationStatus

public boolean getSimulationStatus()
Returns:
True if the simulation is running, otherwise false

startSimulation

public void startSimulation()
Starts the whole simulation. Note, once this is called, orders will immediately start to be processed, resources consumed, and finished resources produced from/into their respective queues.

endSimulation

public void endSimulation()
Halts the simulation, and forces the timer to discontinue looping.

changeSimulationSpeed

public void changeSimulationSpeed(double TICK_RATE)
Parameters:
TICK_RATE - the new value to use for the tick-rate.
